principal

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • principal.App

  • public class App
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the main application that solves the problem
    of having a secret key for AES encryption with a letter and a
    number missing.
    Author:
    Anthony Artavia / Esteban Jiménez

      • Aprendizaje

        public java.lang.String Aprendizaje(java.lang.String strToDecrypt,
                                    java.lang.String key,
                                    java.lang.String[] letras)
        This is the main method when we speak about the learning process. It takes the actual
        set of odds and make new ones based on the probability of a letter to become more/less
        important on the process.
        Parameters:
        strToDecrypt - - String
        key - - String
        letras - - String[] Array
        Returns:
        String corresponding to the result of the operation.

      • prueba

        public java.lang.String prueba(java.lang.String strToDecrypt,
                               java.lang.String key,
                               java.lang.String[] letras)
        This algorithm/method is used once the learning process is concluded
        It gets the actual set of probabilities and check the ones that are
        better. It makes a test with this better ones and determine if the
        learning process was correct or not, based on the quantity of iterations
        that took it to get to the answer.
        Parameters:
        strToDecrypt - - String
        key - - String
        letras - - String[] Array
        Returns:
        String that notifies if the process went all god or something happened.

      • generarProbabilidad
